whyNavnub.title: Why Choose Navnub?
whyNavnub.mission: Mission: To merge creativity with advanced technology to create exceptional digital experiences.
whyNavnub.vision: Vision: To forge a future where web technology is a natural extension of human and business aspirations.

integrationPersonalization.title: Seamless Integration & Customization
integrationPersonalization.paragraph1: Our solutions are designed to integrate perfectly with your existing tools, including WhatsApp Business and your web platforms.
integrationPersonalization.paragraph2: We offer deep customization to ensure our technology adapts to your unique business processes and goals.

chatbotGeneratorPage.title: Chatbot Idea Generator
chatbotGeneratorPage.description: Describe your business needs, and our AI will suggest chatbot solutions for you.
chatbotGeneratorPage.businessNeedsPlaceholder: e.g., We want to improve customer support and automate sales inquiries for our e-commerce store...
chatbotGeneratorPage.noIdeas: No ideas generated yet. Please describe your business needs above.

solutionsPage.title: Our Solutions
solutionsPage.cloudDescription: We specialize in leveraging cloud computing and artificial intelligence to provide scalable, efficient, and intelligent solutions for small and medium-sized businesses. From cloud migration to custom AI model development, we help you harness the power of modern technology.
solutionsPage.webDevDescription: Our team crafts bespoke websites and mobile applications that are not only visually stunning but also highly functional and user-friendly. We focus on creating digital platforms that drive engagement and achieve business objectives.
solutionsPage.chatbotsDescription: Transform your customer interactions and streamline operations with our custom chatbot solutions. We develop AI-driven chatbots that integrate seamlessly with landing pages and WhatsApp Business, providing 24/7 support and automating repetitive tasks.

successCasesPage.title: Our Success Stories
successCasesPage.description: Explore a selection of our projects showcasing our expertise in AI, cloud solutions, web development, and chatbot automation.

blogPage.title: Our Blog
blogPage.description: Insights, news, and articles from the Navnub team on AI, Cloud, Web Development, and more.

testimonialsPage.title: Client Testimonials
